post.description: Consumes the latest verification token and transitions the creator's onboarding state to EMAIL_VERIFIED. Use this when SES is not working and you need to unblock a creator.
post.summary: Force-verify a creator's email (skip email delivery)

post.description: Manually trigger a sync from Resend Receiving API.

get.description: Returns the latest email verification token and password reset token for the given email. Requires admin role. Use this when SES is not delivering emails and you need to complete the onboarding flow manually.
get.summary: Get pending verification/reset tokens for a user by email

get.description: List last 50 jobs for current user.

post.description: Create AI image job, enqueue worker. Rate limited.

get.description: Get job status; when READY, includes presigned result URLs.

post.description: Apply generated image to landing.hero, creator.avatar, or creator.banner.
Requires current password. New password must be at least 10 characters.

get.description: Returns the latest email verification and password reset tokens for a given email. Only available in local/staging environments. Disabled in production.
get.summary: [DEV ONLY] Get verification/reset tokens for a user

post.description: Sends a reset email if the address is registered. Always returns 200 to prevent user enumeration.
Clears the session cookie. Frontend should call this then setUser(null).

get.description: Returns the current authenticated user (any role). Use cookie or Bearer token.

post.description: Requests a new verification email. Always returns 200 to avoid user enumeration. Rate-limited by IP+email.

get.description: Alias of /auth/me for frontend session checks.

post.description: Start CCBill checkout for subscribing to a creator. Returns URL to redirect the fan.

get.description: List all purchases (PPV posts, PPV messages, tips) for the current fan.

post.description: Cancel a subscription at period end.
CCBill webhook: verify digest, idempotent by event id.

get.description: Public: presigned URLs for brand assets (e.g. landing hero). No auth required.

post.description: Public contact form — no auth required. Rate-limited by IP.
